briefTitle: Study of Safety, Tolerability and Immunogenicity of Gardasil速9 in Immunocompromised Patients
officialTitle: An Open-label Phase III Study to Investigate the Safety, Tolerability and Immunogenicity of a Nine-valent Human Papillomavirus (HPV) Vaccine (Gardasil速9) in Solid Organ Transplant Recipients and HIV-infected Patients
summary:
Patients with immunodeficiencies are at increased risk of developing persistent HPV infection and as such HPV-related disease (genital warts and cancer).

In this study HIV-patients and SOT-patients will receive 3 doses of Gardasil速9. Safety, tolerability and immunogenicity will be evaluated up to one month following the 3rd and last dose of Gardasil速9.

primaryOutcome.measure: Seroconversion Following 3 Doses of 9-valent HPV Vaccines
